metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9304 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: libyara/re.c in the regexp module in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted rule that is mishandled in the _yr_re_emit function.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
